name: Franckh-Kosmos Verlags-GmbH & Co. KG
goal:
WHO WE ARE
KOSMOS is a well-established, forward-looking publishing company offering first class media to our broad spectrum of discerning customers. KOSMOS embodies excellence in media pluralism with a strong identity in brand that is rooted in tradition and adeptly carves a creative path into the future.

WHAT WE OFFER
KOSMOS publishes books and produces games, experimental kits and a range of digital products like E-Books, apps and online media. Our books span a comprehensive range of interests:
*the glory of nature
*the joy of gardening
*the life of domestic pets
*the passion for horses and riding
*the outdoor life of fishing
*the tradition of hunting
*the world of food and drink
*the universe of astronomy and cartography
* the spectrum of themes for children and young people
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
